Dialogue.Page: Hey, I came here to check on whatever landed outside the village crater, and found this. Seems to be a seed from Dark Bramble - ain't nothing these trees grew.
If you're reading this, go back and get Hal and Marl to fetch their axes, and get someone to bring a <color=orange>scout launcher</color> to look inside the seed before they get chopping.
I'm gonna go check on that <color=orange>big, locked Nomai door</color> in the big geyser mountain again. Maybe that big crash from the seed knocked the door out... Here's hoping. --Tektite
